mdRecord.dcterms:title: 303. Home of Washington--the "Father of His Country"--Mt. Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wasson, C. L. (Charles L.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the southeast corner of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: International View Co. Photographers and Publishers. Home Office and Works, Decatur, Illinois, U. S. A. Title: 303. Home of Washington--the "Father of His Country"--Mt. Vernon, Va. Copyright, 1900, by C. L. Wasson.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
